definition.name: Kubernetes bake
definition.description: Use this action to bake manifest file to be used for deployments using helm, kustomize or kompose
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: renderEngine
inputs.description: Acceptable values: helm or kompose or kustomize

inputs.name: helmChart
inputs.description: Required if renderEngine == helm. Helm chart to bake.

inputs.name: namespace
inputs.description: Relevant if renderEngine == helm. Namespace to be used for Helm option.

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.description: Acceptable values: helm or kustomize. Arguments to be passed to the Helm or kustomize template command

inputs.name: overrideFiles
inputs.description: Relevant if renderEngine == helm. Array of path to override files. Each path should be mentioned on a newline

inputs.name: overrides
inputs.description: Relevant if renderEngine == helm. Override values to set.

inputs.name: releaseName
inputs.description: Relevant if renderEngine == helm. Release name to be used for Helm option.

inputs.name: kustomizationPath
inputs.description: Required if renderEngine == kustomize. Path to directory or the Git repository containing kustomization.yaml file.

inputs.name: dockerComposeFile
inputs.description: Required if renderEngine == kompose. Path(s) to Docker compose files

inputs.name: helm-version
inputs.description: Version of helm. Installs a specific version of helm binary. Supports semver ranges like ^3.0.0

inputs.name: kubectl-version
inputs.description: Version of kubectl. Installs a specific version of kubectl binary

inputs.name: kompose-version
inputs.description: Version of kompose. Installs a specific version of kompose binary

inputs.name: silent
inputs.description: When set to true, the output of the bake command would not be shown.

outputs.name: manifestsBundle
outputs.description: The location of the manifest bundles created by bake action
